name: Gladiarena
description:
Made as a 1rst year student in Game Design in 3 months.

We decided to continue working on the game, as such when we will have time to work on it, it will recieve updates.

WASD : Move

Arrow keys : Shoot

Space : Upgrade

Credits :
- Lead, Game Design, Debug, Artwork, Animation & Integration of artworks and animations : Chloé Kubacki - Kiluns - @Kiluuuns - https://kiluns.itch.io/
- Coding (Life, Waves, A.I) & Debug : Victor Touron - sassyCorbeau - https://sassycorbeau.itch.io/
- Coding (Character, Power Ups), Debug, Animations Integration & UI: Emilien Bertrand - https://emilien-bertrand.itch.io/ - @BertrandEmilien
- Coding (Power Ups, Ennemies), Debug, SFX Integration & UI : Ludivine Châtin - https://appirial.itch.io/
- Coding (UI), Debug & UI : Jean-Baptiste Maupin - Erbäk -https://erbakasrevnel.itch.io/
- Our beloved character : Decimus
- Ennemies : Chalien, Pulpumanoid
- OST : 8bit Trx - Whelpsounds
- SFX : SFX Pack VOL. 01 : WonderFX - 3rd Note Inc
- SFX : UI SFX, 8-bit SFX, Sci-Fi SFX - Little Robot Sound Factory
